objects.description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has exploited or attempted to exploit Zerologon (CVE-2020-1472) and EternalBlue (MS17-010) vulnerabilities.(Citation: FireEye KEGTAP SINGLEMALT October 2020)(Citation: DFIR Ryuk's Return October 2020)(Citation: DFIR Ryuk in 5 Hours October 2020)

external_references.description: Kimberly Goody, Jeremy Kennelly, Joshua Shilko, Steve Elovitz, Douglas Bienstock. (2020, October 28). Unhappy Hour Special: KEGTAP and SINGLEMALT With a Ransomware Chaser. Retrieved October 28, 2020.
The DFIR Report. (2020, October 8). Ryuk’s Return. Retrieved October 9, 2020.
The DFIR Report. (2020, October 18). Ryuk in 5 Hours. Retrieved October 19, 2020.
